short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use SharePass extension to send your sensitive data securely in just few clicks, without changing your tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SharePass is an online digital solution for confidential information sharing. For users, it allows transferring confidential data safely without leaving a digital trail. For companies, it allows secure communication, credentials protection and overall improvement of cybersecurity.
